Package index

All functions

Aggregate elections data at provided level (ccaa, prov, etc)

INE's code for ccaa and provinces

INE's code for municipalities

INE's code for ccaa and provinces

INE's code for ccaa and provinces

Dates of Spanish elections
extract_code()
Extract region codes from the poll stations codes

Function to get jointly information on polling stations and votes for candidacies.

pollspain – A grammar for the analysis of electoral and poll data
recod_parties
Recoding Spanish political party or candidacies names and preprocessing of acronyms
summary_election_data()
Summaries of the electoral and candidacies ballots data for a given aggregation level (ccaa, prov, etc)

Conversion type election to code
